settings.header.title: Chroma DB Setup
settings.header.subtitle: Embeddings require a chroma database.
settings.text1: The embeddings plugin stores embeddings in a {link} database. To start using embeddings, you need to configure at least one chroma instance.
settings.text1.link.name: chroma
settings.button.add-instance.name: Configure a new chroma db instance
settings.button.list-instances.name: List configured chroma db instances
